title: Riot what the hell is wrong with you? Why isn't this fixed SEVENTEEN days on?

embed.description: I don't have time to test it, but the enemy jungler said he smited me right after I ulted. It definitely wasn't lasting 5 seconds I am sure of that. Edit: According to DontArgueWithMe (NA) (posted below), the true damage proc from skirmisher's sabre also kills through his ult.

body:
I only just dicovered this because a ww used it against me ingame.

There is absolutely no excuse for this not being fixed yet - it was friggin' 17 days ago.
There's a limit to how lazy you can be. Get off your arse and fix it.

replies.body:
It's fixed this patch.

Not that I pity Tryndamere players.

> What patch? There was no patch today.
> And it happened multiple times TODAY.
> {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

reading front page too OP.
dudes got a point, albeit a somewhat aggro point :P
